meanings.sent1: The triphase experiment required three different parts to work together.

meanings.definition: A system or process with three distinct phases or stages
meanings.sent1: The project followed a triphase approach to ensure success.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the triphase of the machine was crucial for its operation.
meanings.sent3: The triphase of the play had the audience guessing at every turn.
meanings.sent4: Life can be seen as a triphase journey from birth to old age.
meanings.sent5: The triphase of the story added depth and intrigue to the plot.
